relocation-in-turkey.title: Relocation in Turkey
relocation-in-turkey.subtitle: Comprehensive support for settling in Turkey - from visa to residence permit

additionalServices: Apartment search and rental contract support
Bank account opening with personal accompaniment

benefits.title: Why Choose Us?
benefits.content: We provide modern, trustworthy service. Unlike agencies that rush through processes, we handle everything properly with official documentation and transparent communication. Every step is tracked and you're always informed.

risks.title: Common Mistakes to Avoid
risks.content: Many students arrive unprepared and face fines for missed residence permit deadlines, rejected applications due to incorrect documents, or housing contract issues. Edu Turkish has been helping students navigate Turkish bureaucracy since 2018 with zero rejected applications.

items.question: How long does the entire settlement process take?
items.answer: The full process typically takes 30-45 days from arrival to residence permit submission. We provide a detailed timeline after you submit your documents.

items.question: Can I pay in installments?
items.answer: Yes, we offer payment plans. Standard package can be split into 2 payments, VIP into 3 payments. Contact us for specific terms.

items.question: Do you work in all Turkish cities?
items.answer: We operate in Istanbul, Ankara, Izmir, Antalya, and Bursa. For other cities, we can provide remote consultation and document preparation.

items.question: Can I order individual services instead of a full package?
items.answer: Yes, individual services are available. However, packages offer better value (15-20% discount) and ensure nothing is missed in the settlement process.

items.question: What are the risks of doing everything myself?
items.answer: Common issues include: incorrect document translations rejected by authorities, missed residence permit deadlines resulting in fines (500-1000 TRY), unfavorable rental contracts, and difficulty opening bank accounts without proper guidance.

items.question: Is accommodation included in the package price?
items.answer: No, the package covers search assistance and contract review. You pay rent directly to the landlord. We help you find options within your budget and negotiate fair terms.

items.question: What documents do I need to prepare before arrival?
items.answer: Required: passport (valid 6+ months), university acceptance letter, diploma and transcript, health insurance certificate, and 4 passport photos. We provide a complete checklist with instructions after booking.

items.question: Do you help with visa applications?
items.answer: Standard package includes enrollment documentation for student visa. VIP package includes full visa application support with consulate appointment booking and interview preparation.

items.question: What happens if my residence permit is rejected?
items.answer: In 6 years, we've had zero rejections when clients follow our guidance. If a rejection occurs due to our error, we resubmit at no cost and cover any related fines or legal fees.

tr-yos-courses.title: TR-YÖS Courses
tr-yos-courses.subtitle: Professional preparation for Turkish university entrance exams

courseGoal.title: Course Goal
courseGoal.description: We prepare for TR-YÖS to achieve the highest possible score sufficient for admission to your chosen faculty — including the most competitive programs. Every student receives an equally strong curriculum, and the result depends on their preparation level and chosen learning format.

items.title: Theory
items.description: Fundamentals of mathematics, logic, and geometry

items.title: Practice
items.description: Many problems solved during theory sessions with detailed explanations

formatSchedule.title: Format
formatSchedule.recordings: Lesson recordings available to our students

items.question: What's the difference between 'Basic' and 'Individual' packages?
items.answer: The curriculum is the same for everyone and aims for a high TR-YÖS score. The difference lies in the group size and level of instructor attention. 'Basic' has up to 10 people, while 'Individual' format involves personal lessons.

items.question: How long is the course?
items.answer: More than 7+ months.

items.question: Are trial lessons available?
items.answer: Yes, if desired, you can attend a trial lesson and familiarize yourself with the instructor's approach.

items.question: What's included in the program?
items.answer: Full TR-YÖS preparation course: mathematics, logic, geometry, problem solving, exam strategy, practice tests, etc.

items.question: What if I miss a lesson?
items.answer: In groups, lesson recordings are provided. In individual format, it's possible to reschedule the lesson.

items.question: How many points can I realistically score after the course?
items.answer: Everything depends on the student's level and effort. The program is designed for preparation to 350+ points with regular participation and homework completion!

items.question: Is the learning format online or offline?
items.answer: The training is conducted online, with live lessons and constant feedback.

sat-courses.title: SAT Courses
sat-courses.subtitle: Expert SAT preparation for international university admissions

courseGoal.title: Target Results
courseGoal.description: Focused on Digital SAT preparation with proven strategies for success.

items.title: Math
items.description: Algebra, geometry, data analysis, advanced math

items.question: How many times can I take the SAT?
items.answer: You can take the SAT as many times as you want. Most students take it 2-3 times to achieve their target score.

items.question: Can I change my test date?
items.answer: Yes, College Board allows date changes for a fee. We'll help you navigate the process and choose the best test date.

items.question: Do I need TOEFL/IELTS too?
items.answer: It depends on the university. Some accept high SAT Reading & Writing scores instead of separate English proficiency tests.

teachers.title: Methodology & Teachers
teachers.methodology: We use a communicative approach with real-world scenarios. Every lesson includes speaking practice, grammar in context, and cultural insights.

profiles.name: Ayşe Yılmaz
profiles.achievements: Native Turkish speaker, 10+ years teaching experience, TÖMER certified

profiles.name: John Smith
profiles.achievements: Native English speaker, CELTA certified, 8 years in Turkey

profiles.name: Mehmet Demir

expectedResults.title: Results in 12 Weeks
skills: Open a bank account in Turkish
Read news articles and understand main ideas
Navigate daily life without translation apps

items.question: What if I miss a class?
items.answer: All lessons are recorded. You can watch the recording and we'll schedule a makeup if needed.

items.question: Can I freeze my course?
items.answer: Yes, you can freeze for up to 2 weeks. Just let us know in advance.

items.question: What's your refund policy?
items.answer: Full refund within first 2 lessons. After that, prorated refund for unused lessons.

document-translations.title: Notarized Document Translations in Turkey
document-translations.subtitle: We help students and clients translate all necessary documents for university admission in Turkey and residence permit applications. Our translations are done by licensed translators (yeminli tercüman) and are accepted by all government institutions.

steps.title: Upload Document
steps.description: You send us documents online by submitting an application (PDF/photo) — no need to bring originals in person

steps.title: We Clarify Details
steps.description: Our manager will contact you to clarify requirements

steps.title: Translate and Certify
steps.description: Licensed translators perform translation with notarial certification

steps.title: Receive Ready File
steps.description: We send completed translations in digital format or paper copy, by courier throughout Turkey if needed

factors.title: Only accredited translators work
factors.description: All our specialists have official yeminli tercüman accreditation with document certification rights

factors.title: Translations accepted by all Turkish government institutions
factors.description: Our translations are guaranteed to be accepted by universities, immigration services and other government agencies

factors.title: Online translation without office visit
factors.description: The entire process can be done remotely — send scans, receive ready translations

factors.title: Verification and correction before certification
factors.description: We carefully check each translation for compliance with Turkish institution requirements

factors.title: Rush translations — within a few hours
factors.description: If you need it quickly, we do translation and certification within 2-3 hours

finalCTA.title: Want to quickly and accurately translate documents for admission or residence permit? Contact us now - we'll check your documents and advise which type of translation you need
